mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Patient ( patient_name, phone_number1, phone_number2, phone_number3, front_registration_number, back_registration_number, gender, zip_code, address, detail_address, insurance ) VALUES ( #{patient_name}, #{phone_number1}, #{phone_number2}, #{phone_number3}, #{front_registration_number}, #{back_registration_number}, #{gender}, #{zip_code}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{insurance} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Patient SET phone_number1 = #{phone_number1}, phone_number2 = #{phone_number2}, phone_number3 = #{phone_number3}, insurance= #{insurance}, zip_code = #{zip_code}, address = #{address}, detail_address = #{detail_address} WHERE patient_id = #{patient_id}
mapper.select: SELECT patient_id,patient_name, front_registration_number, phone_number3, insurance FROM Patient WHERE patient_name LIKE CONCAT(#{patient_name},'%')
